TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit AsyncCompletedEventArgs extends System.EventArgs

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果您使用的類別可實作[事件架構非同步模式概觀](~/docs/standard/asynchronous-programming-patterns/event-based-asynchronous-pattern-overview.md)，此類別會提供*MethodName* `Completed`事件。If you are using a class that implements the [Event-based Asynchronous Pattern Overview](~/docs/standard/asynchronous-programming-patterns/event-based-asynchronous-pattern-overview.md), the class will provide a *MethodName*`Completed` event. 如果您加入的執行個體委派為事件中，您會收到結果中的非同步作業的相關資訊相對應的事件處理常式方法的參數。If you add an instance of the delegate to the event, you will receive information about the outcome of asynchronous operations in the parameter of the corresponding event-handler method. 用戶端應用程式的事件處理常式可以檢查屬性來判斷是否取消非同步工作。The client application's event-handler delegate can check the property to determine if the asynchronous task was cancelled. 用戶端應用程式的事件處理常式可以檢查屬性來判斷是否在非同步工作的執行期間發生的例外狀況。The client application's event-handler delegate can check the property to determine if an exception occurred during execution of the asynchronous task. 如果類別支援多個非同步方法或多次呼叫相同的非同步方法，您可以判斷是哪一項工作引發*MethodName* `Completed`藉由檢查值的事件屬性。If the class supports multiple asynchronous methods, or multiple calls to the same asynchronous method, you can determine which task raised the *MethodName*`Completed` event by checking the value of the property. 您的程式碼必須以追蹤這些語彙基元，稱為工作識別碼，其對應的非同步工作開始和完成。Your code will need to track these tokens, known as task IDs, as their corresponding asynchronous tasks start and complete. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用來追蹤非同步作業的存留期。The following code example demonstrates using an to track the lifetime of asynchronous operations. 此程式碼範例是針對提供之較大範例的一部分類別。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class. [!code-csharp[System.ComponentModel.AsyncOperationManager#11](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.ComponentModel.AsyncOperationManager/CS/primenumbercalculatormain.cs#11)] [!code-vb[System.ComponentModel.AsyncOperationManager#11](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.ComponentModel.AsyncOperationManager/VB/primenumbercalculatormain.vb#11)] [!code-csharp[System.ComponentModel.AsyncOperationManager#12](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.ComponentModel.AsyncOperationManager/CS/primenumbercalculatormain.cs#12)] [!code-vb[System.ComponentModel.AsyncOperationManager#12](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.ComponentModel.AsyncOperationManager/VB/primenumbercalculatormain.vb#12)]

span.para: 遵循事件架構非同步模式的類別可以引發警示的用戶端狀態的暫止的非同步作業相關的事件。如果這個類別會提供 * MethodName *事件，您可以使用告訴用戶端非同步作業的結果。您可能想要傳達給用戶端與非同步作業的結果的詳細資訊容納。在此情況下，您可以在此衍生您自己的類別，從類別，並提供額外的私用執行個體變數和對應的唯讀公用屬性。呼叫方法，再傳回屬性值，如果作業已取消或發生錯誤。

Classes that follow the Event-based Asynchronous Pattern can raise events to alert clients about the status of pending asynchronous operations. If the class provides a *MethodName* event, you can use the to tell clients about the outcome of asynchronous operations. You may want to communicate to clients more information about the outcome of an asynchronous operation than an accommodates. In this case, you can derive your own class from the class and provide additional private instance variables and corresponding read-only public properties. Call the method before returning the property value, in case the operation was canceled or an error occurred.

span.span: if the background operation has been canceled; otherwise .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 當屬性是`true`，非同步作業已中斷。When the property is `true`, the asynchronous operation was interrupted. 應該檢查用戶端應用程式的事件處理常式委派才能存取類別中的任何屬性的屬性衍生自; 否則屬性將會引發如果非同步作業中斷。The client application's event-handler delegate should check the property before accessing any properties in a class derived from ; otherwise, the property will raise an if the asynchronous operation was interrupted. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用來追蹤非同步作業的存留期。The following code example demonstrates the using an to track the lifetime of asynchronous operations. 此程式碼範例是針對提供之較大範例的一部分類別。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class. [!code-csharp[System.ComponentModel.AsyncOperationManager#11](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.ComponentModel.AsyncOperationManager/CS/primenumbercalculatormain.cs#11)] [!code-vb[System.ComponentModel.AsyncOperationManager#11](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.ComponentModel.AsyncOperationManager/VB/primenumbercalculatormain.vb#11)] [!code-csharp[System.ComponentModel.AsyncOperationManager#12](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.ComponentModel.AsyncOperationManager/CS/primenumbercalculatormain.cs#12)] [!code-vb[System.ComponentModel.AsyncOperationManager#12](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.ComponentModel.AsyncOperationManager/VB/primenumbercalculatormain.vb#12)]

span.para: 如果您提供衍生類別中的唯讀屬性時，務必呼叫方法。這可防止用戶端存取可能不是有效的非同步作業失敗的屬性。

If you provide read-only properties in a derived class, be sure to call the method. This prevents clients from accessing properties that are potentially not valid due to a failure in the asynchronous operation.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果非同步作業期間引發例外狀況時，類別會將指派的例外狀況屬性。If an exception is raised during an asynchronous operation, the class will assign the exception to the property. 應該檢查用戶端應用程式的事件處理常式委派才能存取類別中的任何屬性的屬性衍生自; 否則屬性將會引發具有其屬性保存若要參考。The client application's event-handler delegate should check the property before accessing any properties in a class derived from ; otherwise, the property will raise a with its property holding a reference to . 值屬性是`null`如果作業已取消。The value of the property is `null` if the operation was canceled. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用來追蹤非同步作業的存留期。The following code example demonstrates using an to track the lifetime of asynchronous operations. 此程式碼範例是針對提供之較大範例的一部分類別。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class. [!code-csharp[System.ComponentModel.AsyncOperationManager#11](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.ComponentModel.AsyncOperationManager/CS/primenumbercalculatormain.cs#11)] [!code-vb[System.ComponentModel.AsyncOperationManager#11](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.ComponentModel.AsyncOperationManager/VB/primenumbercalculatormain.vb#11)] [!code-csharp[System.ComponentModel.AsyncOperationManager#12](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.ComponentModel.AsyncOperationManager/CS/primenumbercalculatormain.cs#12)] [!code-vb[System.ComponentModel.AsyncOperationManager#12](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.ComponentModel.AsyncOperationManager/VB/primenumbercalculatormain.vb#12)]

span.para: 如果您提供衍生類別中的唯讀屬性時，務必呼叫屬性實作中的方法。這可防止用戶端存取可能不是有效的非同步作業失敗的屬性。

If you provide read-only properties in a derived class, be sure to call the method in your property implementation. This prevents clients from accessing properties that are potentially not valid due to a failure in the asynchronous operation.

span.para: 如果您有衍生您自己的類別，從類別，呼叫您的唯讀屬性方法，再傳回屬性值。如果元件的非同步背景工作角色程式碼會將指派的例外狀況屬性或將屬性設，屬性將會引發例外狀況，如果用戶端嘗試讀取其值。這可防止用戶端存取可能不是有效的非同步作業失敗的屬性。

If you have derived your own class from the class, your read-only properties should call the method before returning the property value. If the component's asynchronous worker code assigns an exception to the property or sets the property to , the property will raise an exception if a client tries to read its value. This prevents clients from accessing properties that are potentially not valid due to a failure in the asynchronous operation.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果類別支援多個非同步方法或單一方法的多個引動過程，您可以判斷是哪一項工作引發*MethodName* `Completed`藉由檢查值的事件屬性。If a class supports multiple asynchronous methods, or multiple invocations of a single method, you can determine which task raised the *MethodName*`Completed` event by checking the value of the property. 您的程式碼將會需要追蹤這些語彙基元，稱為工作識別碼，其對應的非同步工作開始和完成。Your code will need track these tokens, known as task IDs, as their corresponding asynchronous tasks start and complete. 啟動工作的非同步方法的原始呼叫期間設定這個屬性的值。The value of this property is set during the original call to the asynchronous method that started the task. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用來追蹤非同步作業的存留期。The following code example demonstrates using an to track the lifetime of asynchronous operations. 此程式碼範例是針對提供之較大範例的一部分類別。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class. [!code-csharp[System.ComponentModel.AsyncOperationManager#11](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.ComponentModel.AsyncOperationManager/CS/primenumbercalculatormain.cs#11)] [!code-vb[System.ComponentModel.AsyncOperationManager#11](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.ComponentModel.AsyncOperationManager/VB/primenumbercalculatormain.vb#11)] [!code-csharp[System.ComponentModel.AsyncOperationManager#12](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.ComponentModel.AsyncOperationManager/CS/primenumbercalculatormain.cs#12)] [!code-vb[System.ComponentModel.AsyncOperationManager#12](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.ComponentModel.AsyncOperationManager/VB/primenumbercalculatormain.vb#12)]
